item.description:
Lisa Hall, BostonLOA member and an Abraham Hicks practice-tioner/ coach, is organizing 2 DVD screening events (on Friday, 5/29 & Saturday, 5/30) for her dear friend, Peter Beamish.

Donations will be Appreciated
(For the venue and for Peter in support of travel)

RSVP to auraboston@gmail.com


Friends of the metaphysical, this is something you won’t want to miss!

Another mind-bending film.


Plus - Peter Beamish, the creator, director and host of this show, will be on hand to answer your questions after the screening!


Sat. Night, May 30th, 7 pm:
“Introducing Abraham: The Secret Behind The Secret”
Described as “the ultimate creation in our age of enlightenment” this fascinating trilogy introduces you personally to Jerry & Esther Hicks and Abraham - a 21st century phenomenon! Jerry & Esther Hicks are the New York Times best selling authors of the “Ask & It Is Given” and “The Law of Attraction”.

RSVP to auraboston@gmail.com


For links to more info., go to bottom of this page

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Special Event: Take A Giant Step - The Director's Tour re: Abraham Hicks
